title: Breaking a complete t201 mid-grade set
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: Breaking a complete t201 mid-grade set
posts.post_content:
Hi--I am # 20 on the T201 registry under forazzurri2axz and will be breaking up my set over the next week or so.

  38 of the 50 cards are psa 4/4.5;  The other 12 are PSA 5/5.5.  If you would like a pricesheet feel free to email me at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] or 770 873 1181 is my cell.  
regards Bill Latzko

hi Bill,

I have some interest in upgrading some cards, please send a list.

lifeonmars @ zoominternet.net

thanks!

Cliff
